author: Bellular News

93 current and former developers at Leslie Benzies' Build A Rocket Boy studio have published an open letter exposing mandatory overtime, botched layoffs, and management calling them 'family' while wreaking havoc on their lives.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!
